comment.language: On the Feast of the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple:
Pada Hari Raya Masuknya Tuhan Kristus di Bait Allah:

text.language: Ps/ri m~V] afse e~qoun e~piervei: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
The Son of God entered into the temple. Save us and have mercy on us.
Putra Allah telah masuk ke bait Allah. Selamatkanlah dan kasihanilah kami.
ابن الله دخل الي الهيكل. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
